name: Puzzle
tagline: puzzle game based on java swing
body:
### About Puzzle.
Puzzle is a tiny game based on Java Swing Graphy component.It was written since I first known Java Swing.The code seems like to be chaos.However,plz contact me via zhaoyjun0222@gmail.com any time when you get confused.That will be my pleasure!

### Features:
Background music & click audio
Three mode: 3x3/6x6/9x9
Upload your own image
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
